intension: Design an invitation card for a kid's 3rd birthday party. The card should be fun and playful, with a pink color scheme. Include the event details such as the date, time, location, and RSVP contact information.
globalcaption: The image features a pink and gold invitation for a birthday party. The invitation is adorned with a balloon and a gift, creating a festive atmosphere. The event is scheduled for March 30th at 5 pm. The invitation is addressed to
keywords: holiday, birthday, celebration, party, happy, anniversary, fun, greeting, celebrate, festive, pink, invitation, tb

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a pink background with a few gold stars scattered throughout the scene. The stars are of various sizes and are positioned at different locations on the pink surface. The combination of the pink background and the gold stars creates a visually appealing and festive atmosphere

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a pink balloon with a gold ribbon tied around it, sitting on a white background. The balloon is prominently displayed in the foreground, while the background remains plain and uncluttered. The combination of the pink balloon and the gold ribbon creates a festive and elegant atmosphere

body.text: YOU ARE INVITED TO JOIN US FOR A BIRTHDAY PARTY!
